Title: Work That Body for Me
Writer: Jenji Kohan (created by), Jenji Kohan, Jordan Harrison (story editor), Piper Kerman (book)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Natasha Lyonne, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks
Plot: With a major security breach and a lot of new inmates, Caputo has to call in the big guns. Things get a little too real for Crazy Eyes and Lolly.
